title: Topic 001 Question 141
body: You have a Power BI tenant that is linked to an Azure AD tenant. The tenant contains a group named Group1.
You create a paginated report that does NOT use row-level security (RLS).
You need to send a copy of the report to Group1 every Monday at 9 AM UTC.
Which two actions should you include in the solution? Each correct answer presents part of the solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
options: Publish the paginated report to a Pro workspace.
Create a data alert for Group1.
Publish the paginated report to a Premium Per User workspace.
